text:
When students consider the total cost of a college degree, interest payments on student loans should be a transparent part of their financial calculations. My STUDENT Act provides students with the info they need to make sound financial decisions. #IA04
https://t.co/ENlKnt8e0w

Sat down with the @IowaFarmBureau  to discuss issues impacting our farmers & producers in #IA04. From addressing the high cost of inputs to cutting bureaucratic red tape, I’ll always work to deliver results for our rural communities, farm families & independent producers in Iowa. https://t.co/eCFLOUKRgU

78 years ago, American troops stormed the beaches of Normandy as part of General Eisenhower’s Operation Overlord, paving the way for victory in Europe and an end to WWII. Today, we remember the Americans who gave their lives to secure peace and freedom at home and abroad. #DDay https://t.co/f7NZBfA5WJ

President Biden and Secretary Yellen’s absurd claims that inflation was transitory have proven to be completely wrong. Iowans are paying the highest prices for gas and groceries in decades because of wasteful, liberal spending. #IA04
https://t.co/HwHKC0qERv

I’m heartbroken to see the tragic loss of life in Ames tonight. Our churches and the faithful who fill them should never be targets of violence. Lynette and I are praying for the victims, their families, and the entire Ames community.
